ygData.subject: Re: Research above Lev. 29 for wizards, odd Rune,  want to buy a Crysknife
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Its the Dark Elf Necromancer The Crysknife comes off of .. I believe hes somewhere around level 24 ... -- Jamie Macdonald A.K.A Magis DarkStone Mercenary
ygData.messageBody:
Robert Davis wrote:

>
> Well, I buy runes for 2 pp (and friends give them to me). I then make
> spells that would cost me anywhere from 9 to 15 pp to buy. 4 pp for a
> 15 pp spell is a bargin. I also sell spare spells at cost.
>
> Speaking of runes. I was given a Rune of Velious. Anyone know what
> it's used for?
>
> Fuzboo of Bristlebane
>
> PS A friend is looking for a Crysknife, give me a tell if you have one
> for sell. We killed Ghanex many times, but he was never kind enough to
> give us one.
>
>
>
> >Subject: Research above Lev. 29 for wizards
> >
> >Ok, I've spent a lot of time "researching" this whole research
> thing. If
> >you look at the list of researchable spells on
> http://www.mythiran.com/ and
> >compare this to the spell list at stratics you will find that the
> only two
> >spells that are research only are the two level 16 area affect spells
> Pillar
> >of Fire and Project Lightning. Hardly worth the hundreds of plat
> players
> >are spending on runes. The list at stratics only goes to lev. 29.
> Do any
> >of you high level wizards know if research EVER becomes useful?
> Also, are
> >the rumors true about secret spell books? (other than the known 4)
> >
> >Jeannot Lev 22 WIZ <Societus Argenti>
> >Karana Server
>
>
>
> rob.davis@...://oma.hypermart.net/personal.htm
>

Its the Dark Elf Necromancer The Crysknife comes off of .. I believe hes
somewhere around level 24 ...


--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
-----------------------------------------------------------
